pageDescription: Answers to the most common questions about <brand>Diviso</brand> app
supportTeamReady: Our support team is ready to help you 24/7

what_is_diviso.question: What is <brand>Diviso</brand>?
what_is_diviso.answer: <brand>Diviso</brand> is a shared expense management app that helps you split costs with friends and family easily. You can track who owes whom and settle accounts with a single tap.

is_free.question: Is the app free?
is_free.answer: Yes! You can use <brand>Diviso</brand> for free with basic features. We also offer paid plans for advanced features like Trip Planner and Smart Recommendations.

plan_difference.question: What's the difference between plans?
plan_difference.answer: Starter: 70 credits/month with basic features. Pro: 90 credits with advanced reports and AI receipt scanning. Max: 260 credits with all features including Trip Planner and Smart Recommendations.

create_group.question: How do I create a new group?
create_group.answer: From the dashboard, tap 'Create New Group', enter the group name and select currency, then you can invite members via link, phone number, or email.

invite_friends.question: How do I invite friends to a group?
invite_friends.answer: You can invite friends in multiple ways: share an invite link, send an invitation via phone number, or send an email invitation. Each method allows the invitee to join easily.

multiple_groups.question: Can I manage multiple groups?
multiple_groups.answer: Yes! With paid plans, you can create and manage unlimited groups. The free plan allows managing one group.

add_expense.question: How do I add a new expense?
add_expense.answer: From within the group, tap 'Add Expense', enter the amount and description, select a category, then choose how to split among members. You can also attach a receipt photo.

expense_split.question: How are expenses split?
expense_split.answer: You can split an expense equally among all members, set custom percentages for each member, or choose specific amounts for each person as needed.

edit_expense.question: Can I edit an expense after adding it?
edit_expense.answer: Yes, you can edit any expense you've added. Modified expenses may need approval from affected members depending on group settings.

what_are_credits.question: What is the credit system in <brand>Diviso</brand>?
what_are_credits.answer: Credits are points used to activate advanced features like receipt scanning and trip planning. You get monthly credits with your subscription, and you can buy additional credits from the store.

subscription_plans.question: What subscription plans are available?
subscription_plans.answer: We offer 3 plans: Starter (70 credits/month), Pro (90 credits with extra features), and Max (260 credits with all features). Annual plans are also available with up to 36% discount.

buy_credits.question: How do I buy additional credits?
buy_credits.answer: Go to the Credit Store from the main menu. We offer various packages: Starter (100 credits), Popular (200+20 bonus), and Pro (400+80 bonus) with 90-day validity.

referral_program.question: How does the referral program work?
referral_program.answer: Share your referral link with friends. When they sign up and use the app, you earn bonus points (UC) that can be used for advanced features.

referral_rewards.question: What are the referral rewards?
referral_rewards.answer: You earn UC points for each successful referral. You can track your referrals and rewards from the 'Referral Center' page, and share via WhatsApp and Twitter.

ai_trip_planner.question: What is the Smart Trip Planner?
ai_trip_planner.answer: An AI-powered tool to plan your trips. Enter your destination, budget, and duration, and it will suggest a complete itinerary including places, restaurants, and activities with cost estimates.

smart_recommendations.question: How do Smart Recommendations work?
smart_recommendations.answer: Based on your location, group type, and budget, <brand>Diviso</brand> suggests suitable restaurants and places. You can choose between 'Budget' or 'Premium' options based on your preference.

smart_categories.question: What is Smart Expense Categorization?
smart_categories.answer: When adding an expense, the app automatically suggests the appropriate category based on the group type and previous expenses, saving you time and ensuring accurate categorization.

create_budget.question: How do I create a budget for a group?
create_budget.answer: From within the group, go to 'Budgets' and tap 'Create Budget'. Set the categories, amounts, and period, and the app will track your spending and alert you when approaching the limit.

budget_alerts.question: How do budget alerts work?
budget_alerts.answer: You'll receive a notification when you reach 80% and 100% of your budget. A colored progress bar also appears on the group page showing the budget status.

group_chat.question: How do I use the group chat?
group_chat.answer: From within any group, tap the chat icon. You can discuss expenses with members, send messages, and easily agree on how to split costs.

reports_analytics.question: How do I get a detailed report?
reports_analytics.answer: From the group page, go to 'Reports'. You'll find charts showing spending by category and time period, with the ability to export as a PDF file.

change_password.question: How do I change my password?
change_password.answer: Go to Settings > Security, then tap 'Change Password'. You'll need to enter your current password and then the new one twice to confirm.

delete_account.question: How do I delete my account?
delete_account.answer: From Settings > Account, you can request to delete your account. All your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days. This action cannot be undone.

data_security.question: Is my data secure?
data_security.answer: Yes, we use bank-grade encryption to protect your data. All connections are SSL encrypted, and we follow best security practices. We never share your data with third parties.

currencies.question: Does the app support different currencies?
currencies.answer: Yes! <brand>Diviso</brand> supports all major currencies including SAR, USD, EUR, AED, and more. Exchange rates are updated automatically.

offline_access.question: Can I use the app offline?
offline_access.answer: You can view previously saved expenses offline, but adding new expenses or updates require an internet connection to sync data.

receipt_scan.question: How does receipt scanning work?
receipt_scan.answer: Take a photo of the receipt using your camera, and AI will automatically extract the amount, date, and merchant. You can review the data before saving the expense.

avoid_money_disputes.question: How to avoid financial disputes between friends?
avoid_money_disputes.answer: Use Diviso to record all shared expenses as they happen. The clear record and automatic splitting prevents misunderstandings and disputes, and everyone can see their balance clearly.

best_way_split_trip.question: What is the best way to split group trip costs?
best_way_split_trip.answer: Create a group in Diviso and add all travelers. Record expenses as they happen, and the app automatically calculates who paid more and who owes whom.

close_accounts_peacefully.question: How to close accounts without arguments?
close_accounts_peacefully.answer: The complete expense record in Diviso shows all details clearly. Settlement happens with one tap and everyone sees what they paid and what they owe without any debate.

one_pays_others_transfer.question: Does one person have to pay and others transfer?
one_pays_others_transfer.answer: Not at all. In Diviso, anyone can pay any expense and record it. The app calculates the difference automatically and shows who owes whom fairly in the end.
